extension.description: A module that makes it easy to display Location Map based on a JReviews Fields

field.name: google_map_key
field.label: Google Maps key
field.description: Google Maps key. Obtain a key for your website from http://www.google.com/apis/maps/signup.html

field.name: latitude_field
field.label: JReviews Field Name for Latitude
field.description: Put the JReviews Field Name for Latitude

field.name: longitude_field
field.label: JReviews Field Name for Longitude
field.description: Put the JReviews Field Name for Longitude

field.name: latitude
field.label: Map Center - latitude
field.description: Center of your location map - latitude

field.name: longitude
field.label: Map Center - longitude
field.description: Center of your location map - longitude

field.name: zoom
field.label: Zoom Level
field.description: Zoom Level for your location map

field.name: map_width
field.label: Width of map (%)
field.description: The width of your location map (in %)

field.name: map_height
field.label: Height of map (px)
field.description: The height of your location map (in px)

field.name: messag
field.label: Text Message for Marker
field.description: Text Message for the Marker on your location map (HTML code is supported)
